global.welcome: Welcome, King! Ready to run your web table?

auth.onboarding_headline: Step into the lounge. Streets dey watch.
auth.onboarding_sub: No dulling, make you show your moves.
auth.otp_prompt: Enter your one-time code, sharp sharp.
auth.avatar_prompt: Choose your avatar – Make dem sabi you.
auth.calibration_intro: Warm up! Pot 10 balls, let’s see your level.

home.dashboard_greet: How far, {nickname}? E be like say today na your day!
home.feed_empty: No gist yet. Be the first to make noise!

booking.calendar_title: Pick your web slot, no go carry last.
booking.booking_success: Booking sharp! See you for club.
booking.waitlist_join: All tables full? Join waitlist, e go soon reach you.
booking.qr_ticket: Show this QR at the club entrance. Table dey wait!

wallet.fund_wallet: Top up online with Paystack, Flutterwave, or Monnify.
wallet.no_data: No Data? No Wahala! Use USSD or SMS.
wallet.rate_limit: Oga, slow down – money dey run, not fly.
wallet.escrow_notice: Funds locked for challenge. Winner go collect.

challenge.challenge_sent: Challenge sent! Wait make dem answer.
challenge.challenge_received: {name} don challenge you! Accept or dodge?
challenge.completed: E don finish! Winner go chop.
challenge.expired: Challenge expire – Next time, move fast.
challenge.result_win: You be King! Collect your winnings.
challenge.result_lose: No vex, try again next time.

tournament.tourney_full: Omo, e full! Try next one.

shotlab.drill_locked: Unlock this drill for extra street cred.
shotlab.drill_completed: You finish am! See your stats.
shotlab.paid_drill: Pro Drill – Buy to unlock secret sauce.

feed.share_clip: Share to WhatsApp, IG, or TikTok
feed.no_clips: No clips yet. Time to make history.

error.network_down: Network dey fumble. We go try again.
error.unexpected: Wetin dey happen? Something go wrong.
error.server_error: Server dey sleep. Give us small time.

cta.top_up: Top Up – Make Wallet Baff Up

marketing.main_headline: Rack Up. Show Up. Be King.
marketing.sub_headline: No be by mouth – show your skills!
marketing.download_cta: Start now on BLVKDOT Web, join the streets.
marketing.promo_banner: Rack this week, win extra loot!
marketing.referral: Bring your squad, chop bonus together.
marketing.social_proof: Over {number} Kings and Queens dey ball here.
marketing.testimonial_1: “BLVKDOT na gbedu! I dey win, I dey cash out.” – Tunde
marketing.testimonial_2: “E sure for me! My crew dey run things for here.” – Ada
marketing.limited_offer: Limited time: Double XP for new Kings. Oya, join!

gamification.streak_on: Streak dey burn – keep am up!
gamification.season_pass: Unlock Season Pass – Chop more rewards!

safety.report_user: See wahala? Tap here to report.
safety.block_user: Block this user – dem no go disturb you again.

support.help_headline: Need help? We dey your back.
support.feedback: Drop Feedback – We dey hear you.

legal.tos: By using BLVKDOT Web, you agree to our Terms of Service.
legal.privacy: Your data dey safe with us.
legal.age_gate: You gats be 18+ to play for money.

offline.offline_mode: No network? Play practice mode, rack up offline.

data_saver.activate: Data dey finish? Switch to Data Saver mode.
data_saver.activated: Data Saver mode dey on – enjoy longer!
